So now we're stuck wishing the built in speaker volume was would go up louder.

Edit 2: Their customer service team reached out promptly and were incredibly professional and understanding. I am very satisfied with the solutions they provided as they fully resolved my issues with audio and image quality.Edit: I’ve used the projector 5 times now, and the audio has worsened over time. There is a grinding noise that occurs every 10 seconds or so that is very distracting. It stays even if I adjust the volume and even if I place the projector on a soft surface (in case it was sounds from vibrating on a hard surface). Feeling more and make dissapointed in this product with time.Although the brightness is sufficient when used in combination with black-out curtains, the coloring produced by the projector is quite off. The pale objects and pale people in shows appear washed out. It is therefore too distracting to watch most shows using this projector. Despite using the available image settings, it does not seem possible to make the projector's results match the coloring of shows as I see them on a laptop or TV. Faces appear either white or orange...Similarly, the speaker is okay if the room is otherwise silent (e.g. air conditioner is off). If I have to increase the volume to overcome the sound of the projector's fan PLUS an air conditioning unit, then audio sounds harsh and garbled.
Cannot get it to connect to Bluetooth. Other than that okay machine.

**NOTE: I didn't rate the remote because I don't plan on using it**This is my first projector, so I can't really compare it to anything else. However, I'm glad it's my first! It's great for the price and the fact that it was on sale ($100 --> $80). It comes with a short HDMI cable, a remote (buy batteries duh), another pair of wires (which i would assume is for external speakers ?), a projector screen, and sticky hooks that don't damage your walls/paint. Also, I had to buy an HDMI adapter (HDMI --> USB C) in order to connect it to my MacBook Air.If you're looking for a projector with top notch quality, then you'd probably have to look for something more expensive. The picture quality isn't terrible to the point where you can see pixels, but it's still decent & definitely works for me since I'm not picky. It doesn't have a zoom (to increase or decrease the screen) if you were expecting that, but it does allow you to change the vertical of the screen (like the editing option in the Apple Photos app) & the focus.It projects really well on both the screen provided and a plain dry wall. People said that they can only watch when it's completely dark in their room, but I can see fairly well during the daytime when my blinds are closed (Picture 1) & when my bright lamp is on during the night (Picture 2).As for sound, I just listen through my laptop while it projects onto my screen since I don't have speakers, which I genuinely don't mind. The noise from the projector when it's on is a little loud, but that doesn't bother me either. Overall, like another person said, if you have the right expectations for this pretty cheaply priced projector, then I think you'd enjoy it!

We bought these for our teenage kids’ bedrooms in lieu of a traditional tv. They love them. Both rooms have room darkening blinds and get a 7-8ft diagonal screen projected on a regular white wall. if the lights are on it is dim but visible. Audio is acceptable. Is it perfect, no. Does it look good enough to watch tv, movies, and play Xbox, yes. If you need the high detail of an oled, go buy one. This is not that. We use fire stick 4K to stream all shows. If you choose Jinhoo as your TV (for ir code) you can control power and volume.This is a fixed throw, meaning you have to move it closer or farther to get smaller or larger screen size. Manual focus and manual keystone.

I have a small-ish size game room in my townhouse.. a tv would’ve taken up some valuable walk space. This was a PERFECT alternative!! I used an old Roku box since I don’t have the adapter for my MacBook. Works really well. Picture is great.The only fault is the sound is a little variable through the show and a commercial and I had a little trouble booking up the Bluetooth, could be user error or sometimes the signals suck down here. Otherwise, no complaints and I haven’t even hung up the screen yet-the pic is just the projector on my wall.Definitely worth the try, especially for the price!

I’ve used many projectors over the years, some being really expensive and some on the other end.This projector is on the cheaper side but for the price you get what is advertised. Not sure if the lumens are accurate but the quality of video is a nice 1080p.Good: decent video quality, not bad sound (was not expecting that), lots of outputs for supportEhh: this thing is LOUD. You can hear the fans running heavily so I would keep it in a cool area although I have not had any issues overheating yet. This thing is also bigger than I expected and you have to manually move it back and forth to change the size of screen you want to project which can get annoying.In the end you get what you pay for. It’s a decent projector that gets the job done and that’s exactly what I got it for so I won’t complain! The “screen” add on it came with is just a white sheet but actually projects great video onto it if you don’t have a white wall.

This is a nice little projector, easy to use, move, adjust and connect. The only issues I see is the sheet that comes with it, it is very thin so you can basically see right trough it, better off just using blank wall space or a bed sheet. The brightness could be better but as long as the lights are off you’ll be fine.

reviewTitle: A great deal for the price
reviewDescription: We don't have a tv, but we use our projector every night to watch a movie through Apple TV. When our $3,000 projector broke after 6 years, we purchased this. We figured it would be a temporary thing we would use until we could afford to replace the $3,000 model. Well, we have now been using this for over 6 months just fine. The picture is NOT as clear as our expensive projector, but it's totally acceptable. You cannot tilt the screen or adjust the size without moving the actual projector up/down/back/forward, but again--that's a feature you pay a lot of money for. For the price of this projector, we are very happy with the picture and the way it works.

2nd Update: The customer service has been great, the projector is pretty good for the price range. Picture is decent, sound is decent. If you are looking for a projector in this price range with wifi and casting capabilities (both android and iOS) , this would be a good choice. We'll see if it still works in 3-4 months when I use it again.For those that are curious, I went with a factory refurbished Epson EF-100W instead. It was quite a bit more expensive ($500), but the image quality is excellent, and having Google TV built in really makes a big difference.EDIT: The company did reach out and send me an upgraded model free of charge, I have not had a chance to hook it up yet, as I had already purchased a replacement. Will update again once I power it on. The vendor has displayed great customer service in trying to remedy the problem thus far, upgrading to two stars until I am able to further review.I unboxed this projector back in September when I bought it, hooked it up, it worked great, put it back in the box. Took it out again today, and the picture is horrible, it won't focus, it's dim, the largest picture I could manage and still read the menu was about 20“. I'm fairly tech savvy, so I tried everything I could think of,  nothing worked. I had high hopes for this projector based on all the great reviews, but it only lasted for one 10 minute usage. I do not recommend it based on my experience.

reviewTitle: Por el precio está muy bien
reviewDescription: Lo malo q tiene es que no puedes ver Netflix aunque lo conectes con el l cable hdmi
They only thing I have been able to get it the hdmi to recognize. It won’t recognize my Nintendo switch, my iOS adapter hdmi… I’m not understanding why !!!
It meets the requirements for home movies but the fan it's loud and the video has low light output, only good in a completely blacked out room.
Es difícil para conectarlo además que es para ubicarlos es un poco complejo. La tela blanca que trae para proyectarlo no es buena
Wont let me turn the brightness up???? Why way to fix that. It's completely blacked out and will not let me.

It was great for a couple months then the bulb burnt out started in the top left corner and took over half of the screen about 5 days after never was able to get through to customer service so I bought a different brand and lost out on my money

Not a fan of the picture quality or having to manually focus the lens. It seems I adjust it for one show or movie and then have to adjust it for the next. Not vedi bright either. Will return for a model that has auto focus

This projector does a good job while indoors any little ambient light makes the screen really really dull. On a largest screen format you lose a lot of the resolution. Would be a good project projector for indoor but not outside as intended.
It wirk good for what I needed it for
The picture was quite blur , I returned it

The picture quality is great. However, I was disappointed on not being able to directly plug in my phone, and having to yet get another adapter. Therefore, I’m returning this one and getting one with wifi capability.

If you use this projector connecting your laptop, then it works great.But, If you need to connect your phone with the projector with the Bluetooth, then good luck. It never connected. And I have tried multiple times, multiple days, in a work environment and my house as well.Also, the USB doesn't not read power points, therefore if you plan to use it for work, then use a different platform. Returning right away.

reviewTitle: Not for me but is okay for budget only nighttime option
reviewDescription: While this projector did not meet my needs; the fan was insanely loud to me personally and the picture is completely unusable during the day even with proper window treatments and the projector had a defect where I couldn’t not get the lens to focus on the entire screen at once...All that said. If you’re only using this at night? With ZERO light pollution and outside it is perfect.Inside, even if you have a pitch black theater room, which I do, this projector does not meet those needs.I highly respect the fact that the customer support from the seller was quick on the response for return. Not only offered refund quickly and easily but was kind for the entire process.Given that the pandemic has left most people socially inept this was a REFRESHING change of pace.Once again without defects that I had, If viewing outside without light pollution this will be a great value purchase and it is quite small compared to other projectors which makes transport easier. —indoor regular home theater usage this will likely not meet your standards.

*UPDATE*After this review, I had customer service reach out to me and offer me a full refund and to keep the product. I haven't had a moment to mess around with the sound stuff, but once I do, this review will be updated again. I appreciate customer service and how fast they were with responding and with issuing a refund.BRB when I play with sound settings and different hookups :)*ORIGINAL REVIEW. BOUGHT 8/30/22*Extremely disappointed in this purchase. I purchased this to use for my son's 13th bday party. We set everything up outside, had all these kids waiting on a movie. Only to figure out about 2 hrs later, that when the movie is playing, and if there is background music, that is what comes in loud and clear. But the dialogue? Ehh. Not so much. Literally no sound at all for the dialogue. Such a disappointment. Will be returning and looking for something better

reviewTitle: Meh- needs to be super dark
reviewDescription: I wouldn’t say it’s the worst price it’s just not the quality expected. The reviews raved about it but you have to have it really really dark to see it. And I obviously know it’s a projection of light so if you have lights brighter you can’t see it as well but what I’m saying is if we did a movie night outside it would have to be pitch black which is hard because of surrounding house lights and the lights on the street.

reviewTitle: It's very hard to set the angle(Blur issue)
reviewDescription: As the headline, it's hard to find an accurate angle to make the screen clear. If I touch the machine and the angle gets tilted, the screen becomes blurry again. (If you have a cat, you may want to consider of purchasing it unless you have an enclosed table to keep it from cats, your kid, or even yourself.)

It’s compact with a pretty decent picture quality but it doesn’t work for what I intended it to. It simply won’t connect with my Apple hdmi connector so I can’t stream or watch YouTube. It works with chrome cast but I was hoping to not need Wi-Fi while we were camping. It comes with nice cords to support plug ins. It also will not connect to my jam box Bluetooth speaker.  It’s worth noting that if you have an iPhone most streaming is simply unsupported with projectors.
Easy to set up. But the picture quality degrades from system to the wall screen.

reviewTitle: Very low quality projector, the fan is overly loud and the picture quality is bad
reviewDescription: I bought this to replace a cheap rca procector that i bought for the same price at wallyworld. That projector was brighter, clearer, fan was probably half as loud and the sound twice as good. The picture is so dim and the colors are so off and it just has a real cheap look to it. Even in the dark it is hard to see stuff at times. It's decently clear, but it's just overall poor picture quality with the horrible colors. The fan is so loud that you have to crank up the volume in order to drown it out, but when you turn up the volume it has this tinny high sound that is hard on the ear's. It's nearly not even usable without headphones on to drown out the sound. The projector that i replaced that i had for a few yrs was about the same price and came with a roku stick as well, and bluetooth for sound. Overall this is more so a toy for children.

reviewTitle: Pay attention to what cords come with!
reviewDescription: Should have came with usb cord. Apple has them but they cost a little less than the projector itself. Should have read small print on what it really came with.
It has poor image quality and the projector only worked for 6 months. Now it cuts on but will shut off after 5 minutes.

Edit: up to 4 stars from 2 purely for the company caring about their reviews, and to make the user happy.Company support is very good and sent me a replacement upgraded unit for free. I cant say it is amazing, but I can say it is definitely worth what I paid. You arent going to get a $1000 projector or that kind of performance at this price, but if you want a projector for a bonus room or something. It will work. Would like a zoom feature to be able to mount at the distance I want. Would also like the edges to be a bit clearer. It is out of focus around the very outside perimeter.Boasts 7200 lumens but MAYBE 1200? Boasts 80% in fan noise… compared to what though? A Jet engine? Bought it for the below area of my daughter’s loft bed, and the fan is so loud it is too distracting to use. Maybe if it was placed 20 feet away, but it would definitely not be bright enough. There is also not a zoom feature to adjust for how far away you install it. You have to install the projector the correct distance back to fill your screen area, not in the convenient place you THINK you are going to install it. The lens focus is functional, but it will look blurry no matter how much you focus it because the native 720p resolution makes you feel like its the year 1999 again!Pros:Cheap, lightweight, easy to install, speakers are slightly louder than the fan.Cons:Dim, low resolution, has to be manually placed at a distance appropriate to the size you want (no lens zoom), LOUD.

I honestly love this projector! The picture quality during the day is really washed out, but I’m not a person who watches tv all day so I only turn this on mid day/night when I’m winding down. Having black out curtains might help with that during the day. The sound is actually pretty good. It’s automatically at 50 and I turned it up to about 80-85 and I noticed the difference. You can also hook a speaker to have it louder but I hooked my Roku in the HDMI port and it’s great for movie nights. So far great purchase for myself 😊

Tried to thread it onto my tripod and the female part that I was screwing the tripod into cracked in half and came crumbling apart. Definitely cheaply made. If you want to cast anything from your phone, this doesn't have bluetooth so you'll need a chromecast to wirelessly play things, it doesn't just plug and play from a hard drive either, so nothing can be done without some extra wires the old school way. Also the picture doesn't fully come into clarity so you have to decide if you want the left or right side of your picture to be clearer. Other than that, you pretty much get what you pay for.UPDATE:Got an email from the company that makes these and their customer service, initially they asked to replace the original which I agreed to. They replaced it with an upgraded model which works wonderfully, I'd say buy the more expensive model and skip this one. Next, I asked if I'd have to return the original to which they said that the new projector was a gift and I'd still get a refund, super nice, totally favorable. I hadn't gotten a chance to come back and update the review here just yet but I guess they're now refunding me fully even without returning the initial product, though I will be doing so as I now have a better version and wasn't asked to edit the review until after receiving the new and updated model of this product, starting the refund, and needing to return the first one anyhow since it is broken and malfunctioning. So customer service here is 5/5, this product is a 3/5 and the new model is 5/5 overall. Just a heads up to anyone looking at this product specifically.
Awesome size, easy to use and setup, portable, Bluetooth.
Good image quality. I did struggle with Bluetooth connectivity for a speaker connection.

Had some trouble connecting my Roku to the system. Once I was able to connect it worked really well. You need to be in a very dim area in order to use the projector or it's hard to see. Perfect for movie nights though! It's actually like having your own movie theatre.
I have had this projector for 4 years now and it has worked great!  Sometimes the lighting affects the picture, but this works perfectly in place of a full TV and of course, the 100" screen is great!
All good

You have to have an external speaker bc you can’t hear it using outdoors and a lot of other sounds around.  Picture is good but need dark environment to see picture. It’s small and light wait so easily portable.After I voiced concern about the product in another review customer service reached out to me and offered me a kindle fire stick to see if it worked and if I liked it. I’ve never Ed used a fire stick before but it is SO much easier than plugging in my laptop or dvd player. And because both are small they’re easily portable. Just make sure have plug or power source for both which use basic two prongs so regular extension cords will work great.Great customer service is rare these days so it’s nice when you find a company who has it. That alone I would recommend the seller.
Purchased this product for watching movies outside for the summer with the kids. It had everything but the case to store it but I purchased 1 and it was inexpensive and held everything to the 📷..

reviewTitle: Not worth the price, very disappointing.
reviewDescription: The screen was the biggest disappointment of all with this product. It was really thin and small which isn't good for showing movies to a large group. The picture quality was also disappointing. It was blurry and wouldn't perfectly focus for nothing. The also is no scaling option to scale the picture to fit the screen so you have to either move it closer or further back and prop an object under it. The remote was notmuch help either and it was not compatible with an iPhone nor a firestick although the instructions mentioned TV stick compatibility. Not worth the cost.

At first I really liked this product! I was using it almost every night to watch movies, tv shows, and YouTube, but then I started to notice the screen would just go black randomly. I could still hear what I was watching but there was no image on the screen. I turned the projector off and unplugged everything, and it worked however the blank screen happened more and more after that first time. Now even if I turn off and unplug everything, the screen will not show. Very disappointed because I loved this product at first!

Clearly says in headline and description that screen is included however it was not in the box. Audio quality is not great but I have speakers so will use those. Full test will come later and will update review.

reviewTitle: Iphone CANT connect via USB without purchasing an adapter piece
reviewDescription: 2. If you have an Iphone you have to buy a $50 adapter piece to connect with your phone (inconvenient & annoying!!!!)I WOULD SUGGEST PURCHASING A MORE EXPENSIVE PROJECTOR THAT HAS BLUETOOTHCONNECTION otherwise you’ll have to connect your phone or laptop directly
Stops working after a year and had some kind of stain on the lens
The image quality is terrible, it is not worth the purchase

reviewTitle: Did not connect to all listed sources and stopped working
reviewDescription: Picture quality is decent. Would not connect to fire stick, lightning to hdmi or vga. It used to connect to my computer via hdmi cord, but now does not.Haven’t had it too long. I wanted to like it so bad bc I love outdoor movies also I hate returning things. Was annoyed that it wouldn’t connect to multiple sources but now that it won’t connect to ANY it’s useless . Got a couple months use like 1 movie every couple weeks before it stopped.
The screen is very thin,and very wrinkled. It  isn't good quality. The images aren't so clear. For the price its to be expected I guess 🤷
It’s a good quality projector but it’s so loud. Sometimes I’ll pause what I’m watching to read something and this will be all I hear. Quite annoying

Everything was shoved into the box, nothing was wrapped.  I'm not sure if it even works because they sent me a return rather than a new product!  Will try it out and return if not working.  Not happy with this product.  I don't even know if all the parts are there!
The first one I received had a large black spot on the screen that was coming from the inside. I returned it and the next one had no problem

I got this for small camping trips. Turns out the cable sent in don’t work. You will need to buy your own cables. Once I bought my own cables it was a great product. I use it for college projects, friend hang outs and camping.

I have tried several $200 and under projectors. This represents a good value especially since it includes a screen.  It is easy to use and the brightness and speaker are decent. Do not like that it does not have a scaling/zoom feature, is a bit noisy, and experienced some lag with the Bluetooth speaker.

reviewTitle: Does not come with HDMI adapter to connect to phones only to TVUSB
reviewDescription: Could not use because adapter to connect phone wasn't included, and do not have a TV

Overall I enjoy this projector, it's a great alternative to a tv in a college dorm. Majority of the time when turning it on, however, the light turn on inside, but there is no image, it will take anywhere from a minute to 10 minutes of turning it off and back on to fix this. It's very frustrating as this had very good reviews and it's a struggle to turn it on.Edit:The seller reached out to me and offered to either send a new projector or give a refund, I opted for the refund option, which I greatly appreciated. They did, at the end ask that I remove my review. I chose to increase from 2 to 3 stars as I appreciated them reaching out to fix the projector.
Es bastante pesado para trasladar y no es tan fácil de conectar, especialmente con iOS

The projector itself is pretty good for being only in 720p. It plays HD video and looks good enough for movie nights or casual gaming. Its not the brightest and its completely invisible when you turn a bright light on like a cieling fan or lamp but its bright in the dark. The problem is the screen. It is slightly transparrent and does not reflect the light properly and it also makes it look blurry is if the screen was covered in Vaseline. Its nothing more than a white tablecloth with metal rings. If you can shell out $50 - $70 more for a decent screen, you can actually get a much better picture quality and it might even be good enough for a starter/budget home theater.

reviewTitle: Works well with Fire Stick, does not work with iPhone
reviewDescription: Maybe someone who is super tech savvy can get it to work, but I bought the hdmi to lightning cable and it will play my phone screen sometimes but it will not play Netflix.  Maybe it a a licensing thing with Netflix or apple, but it is not intuitive how to make this work.  I’m going to keep messing with it to see if I can get it to work, but for the moment it gets 1 star from me and I would return it if it wasn’t passed the return window…

reviewTitle: You Get What you Pay For
reviewDescription: it lights up.  it projects but the operating system is junk.  Won't recognize USB sticks that work fine on other projectors.  I think this is honestly USB2 max.  Not USB4 or whatever the specs say.
La funcion bluetooth no funciona al menos como lo explican en las instrucciones, lo demas buen producto.

We set the projector up by our hot tub. Was easy to setup and picture quality was pretty good. But the sound was very low.  I turned the volume all the way up but it stayed the same. I will be contacting the company to get this resolved and if it’s taken care of I will give 5 stars. Good value and great product but I can’t use it if I can’t hear it.
The Projector fan is very loud.Picture is good - but we use it in a small roomHad to purchase an adapter to use with iPad/iPhone

I’ve owned several projectors, we would rather watch movies on them than a tv. You kind of expect them to go out about every year or two. This is the only one I’ve had that messed up within 3 months. Kicking myself for not ordering the same one I did in the past.

The built in UI software is very half baked, probably because of the lack of onboard Wi-Fi to take advantage. Fan is not as quiet as they make it seem for a small room usage. I also can’t find a way to adjust screen zoom nor a way to update software? Has this product gone unsupported because of a newer version?Color is okay, brightness is decent without using the screen…speaker sounds just alright too, kind of drowned out by fan noise…Remote control layout is also pretty bizarre

reviewTitle: Came packaged nice decent size good audio
reviewDescription: Everything looked good and solid until powered up and tried to watch something, image is nice and clear but there is a scratch on the lense and a piece of melter plastic inside on the inner lens which causes a black spot on the image at all times

reviewTitle: Great for the $…. Until it stops working
reviewDescription: Bought this for camping, worked great picture was clear…. Volume on the other hand was way too low. Put it away after the one time use, pulled it back out and I can’t seem to get it to stay on, just keeps turning off :/ I paid $118 for a weekend of use. I hope I’ll be able to get a replacement . Great deal for the money if it doesn’t fail like mine did

reviewTitle: Fan makes a really loud buzzing noise
reviewDescription: The built in speaker isn’t loud enough to drown out the noise the fan makes. It began running loudly after 3 months.

Brightness is really low, screw for adjustment of height at bottom is loose and small, difficult to focus whole image at the same time - at least one side is blurry - bought this product because of good reviews but disappointed. Will probably return.
Still may return

At first very satisfied, but after using about 5 times the resolution is not good anymore. don’t know if the bulb is going out or what. Alison does not have bluetooth. there are several in this price range that have bluetooth, i must of read product description wrong. Will be returning.

reviewTitle: First projector they sent me was garbage - the second one not so bad
reviewDescription: This projector broke after one use - one of the mirrors inside melted causing a black smear to show up on the screen. You get what you pay for. Stay away from this one.EDIT:Customer service contacted me and sent out a new projector. This one was on throughout the evening and did not break down. Pleased with this company being proactive and righting their wrongs. The projector is not terrible but don't expect cinema quality - nice little cheap projector is all.
A great option for someone who prefers less detail but a bigger picture. We have a flat screen monitor with a crisp image and having seen this I’d prefer it, especially for special effects.

You get what you pay for. I wasn’t too happy with the image quality, the loud-sounding fan, and the extra essentials I would’ve had to get to have a projector in my room, which included a blackout curtain and a projection mount. However, if your balling on a budget or a student, please take advantage of the deal. Excellent decorative investment for a child’s room, they can host movie nights with their friends. Make memories to last them a lifetime.

reviewTitle: Absolute garbage - stopped turning on after a few hours of use
reviewDescription: Bought this for extremely light use...Used it a few times before it stopped turning on.  I plug it in and the light comes on red and hitting the power button makes it turn green for a few seconds but it makes no attempt to turn on (no output, no fan).  Probably has less than 5 hours of runtime on it.  Waste of money and since it was used so seldom I am outside the return windowUPDATE: Seller reached out and completed a refund on the item despite it being outside the return window so I have added 2 stars for good customer service.
Product works fine, sound is impressive right out of the box, my only discrepancy is I am unable to adjust the keystone to sharpen picture quality

reviewTitle: sound started to sound odd after a couple weeks of use
reviewDescription: I love this projector. It was working amazing. Until after a couple of weeks of use there is a strange echo in the sound that I can not get rid of. Ive changed settings on volume and nothing is fixing it. I never turned it up too loud to blow the speaker out. so I am not sure what happened. Im pretty bummed I used it alot in my room on my wall.

reviewTitle: I paid for a new projector and received a used one.
reviewDescription: The projector seems to work fine but I should have received one new in the box and mine was not. The screen was balled up in the box and the projector is dirty. This would have been perfectly acceptable if I bought a used one but not brand new.
I returned this bc I didn’t realize it wasn’t Bluetooth and the cord you need doesn’t come with it. By the time you buy the $15 cord you could just upgrade to a better projector with Bluetooth.

reviewTitle: Is it good but didn't hook up to my phone
reviewDescription: I bought this projector it is a good product. It doesn't hook up to our phones we even bought the plug for it too work with our phones and still doesn't work. So maybe return and the get the wifi capability one instead of using the plug. I was so pumped for it to work

reviewTitle: Not an EPSON but good For the price
reviewDescription: We’ve had this for about 5 months since our daughter broke our EPSON running through the house. We can see the picture but not clearly. The adjusters do not adjust well on the screen. Clear on the bottom and blurry up top or the opposite.
the visuals are super clear and it was really self explanatory to set up. great product
Works great! My family and I have been enjoying our time having Friday movie night with it!

reviewTitle: The voice disappears after some time
reviewDescription: All good except the sound disappears after some time as its speaker is not good, but the display is cool, I mange to buy an external speaker and things ok right now
Overall it's a good projector for my needs, bough it for my sons movie nights and he likes to big screen on the wall or outside.

Honestly shocked at how amazing this little projector is the sound is really loud for how compact it is, it was really easy to set up and the image quality and color looks amazing. The sheet it came with will let me use it at different events and take it with me to watch movies anywhere.

Been wanting one for awhile and I finally picked this one up. Easy setup and was able to use the 1st night i received it. Clean picture and you can connect to blue tooth speaker. I had an awesome movie night with the family last weekend. Excellent buy!!!
We have so far enjoyed our projector. My daughter and her friends enjoyed using it to watch movies while in the pool. The picture is clear and the sound is great. We would purchace again.
Excelente resolución de imagen , fácil de utilizar  el audio está bueno me encantó
I loved it, its image, sound and how big it looks.I am very satisfied with this purchase.
I’ve used it a couple times now and it’s awesome for on the go!

reviewTitle: The picture goes blank if you're room is over 70°F
reviewDescription: At first glance the picture quality was poor as in the colors looked week. I adjusted the picture settings and got it looking pretty good but not perfect. It's still lacking in the color department. The main problem is that the picture goes blank but you can still hear the sound. I have to turn it off and back on again to get it to work. This only started happening when I turned up the thermostat to 72°F. I normally have my room at 68°F and at that temperature the picture doesn't go blank. I believe it is just overheating but it doesn't worn you it just go's blank. I opened it up to see why it might be overheating and noticed it has two fans to keep the power supply and LED backlight cool but no way to cool the main board (That is the brain of the projector) and thay put the board directly above the hottest part of the projector (The LED backlight). So the board is just getting baked by the backlight causing it to stop working. I don't know how many times it will be able to handle that before it fails completely. Oh and the keystone adjustment is terrible it barely does enything. So don't get this projector unless you like to live in the cold. After I posted my review a sales manager from TMY reached out wanting to send me an upgraded replacement projector for free and was very helpful and nice. I wasn't expecting the company to reach out to help. Not many do that, the customer is the one that has to reach out directly "typically" to maby get help. Good job TMY on your customer service.

Had this a bit over a year and after about 6 months it had a “huge dark spot” in the center that has gotten progressively worse. After researching it it means some part burned out and it’s not the bulb. Wish it would have lasted longer. Looks really bad now.
The quality is good. The speaker works at times. Other times it sounds like you’re under water. I was excited for this but it’s just okay. I wouldn’t purchase again.

reviewTitle: Picture and video quality is not good
reviewDescription: picture and video quality no where near to the epson or benq projectors. I can understand with that price you can not get a good quality projector.
Didn’t really work. We ended up returning it.
Las letras del menú son borrosas, lo cual dificulta poder elegir bien las opciones, la imagen no es la mejor pero cumple la función.
It was cool whileIt lasted but it stopped working less than 5 months in don’t even turn on

ProsQuiet and decent picture.ConMenu in manual and the actual menu when using device do not match.  I have older projector mounted on ceiling but I couldn't use that because the front ceiling option from pictures indicate it will angle down picture, in truth it does not. Also no zoom so even if I lowered the mount it cast to large a picture and my screen is bigger than the one included.  I would have to set it up about 4 ft off the ground and about 2ft from ceiling to have correct size. Unfortunately that would but it where my couch is.Not a bad but if you want a portable projector but it does not suite my needs.

I wanted to like this projector and had low expectations due to the low cost. The focus was not crisp, which I expected due to other reviews and did not bother me since you don't really notice when watching moving video anyway. However, the product description goes out of its way to claim that it's very bright. In fact, it's hardly visible at 120" projection size, even in a dark room. It was so dim that I returned it the day after it was delivered. I ended up buying a GROVIEW for $150 and it's easily worth the extra price, as it's very bright and the picture quality is much better.
The fan is quite loud and distracting. The remote I got doesn’t work. Really not worth it. The picture is OK.

Is not user friendly to connect to Android phone or operate without a Roku or Fire stick. Very portable. Great appearance. Doesn't seem to get hot. If I knew how to use it it would probably be very versatile.
It has a decent speaker built in. And good brightness. However it markets it as 1080 when its native is 720 and only is good for streaming movies.Games come out all color washed and not as sharp

reviewTitle: Great quality, but doesn't have wifi capabilities.
reviewDescription: Great picture, great sound but I didn't notice it didn't have WiFi capabilities when purchasing it. Overall for it's value I'm happy with my purchase.
The picture is good in a dark room of course it’s just that my remote does not work well I have to keep pressing hard I changed the batteries

Have had this for about a year (purchased December 2022) and used about once a week, and now the bulb is starting to go out. The coloring is messed up, starting with the warm colors, and no longer clear. No clear way to get into contact with customer service.Up until now, the quality has been real good for the price. Pretty clear when used in a dark setting and comes with the necessary equipment.Was relatively easy to set up, able to use immediately upon opening.
The piece used to secure it to a tripod etc just fell apart, leaving broken brass on the threads that won’t seem to come off.  Not worth it

reviewTitle: Gets the job done, but low quality
reviewDescription: It's not very bright and difficult to get clear picture unless you turn all the lights off in the room.

reviewTitle: Decent quality but has no zoom.
reviewDescription: Bought this for my bedroom but the screen adjustment options are not great and there is no zoom so you have to physically move the projector around to adjust the screen size.

reviewTitle: Needed to buy another adapter cord
reviewDescription: Doesn't have Bluetooth.. maybe a couple gens behind.. made the boyfriend hook it up, works good, not as portable as I had hopedDoes connect to Bluetooth speakers **

reviewTitle: Here for a good time, not for a long time
reviewDescription: I really enjoyed this projector when we first got it! Sound was good, picture was good, easy to use. The Bluetooth never worked but I didn't mind, I didn't have super high expectations. However, a burn spot showed up about six months into owning it. This picture was taken less than a year into owning and using this projector, as you can see nearly half the screen is tinted dark orange by the burnt out bulb. Know that this item will kick the bucket someone quickly, would advise buying a different projector if you're looking to use it regularly!

reviewTitle: Great Mini Projector; Not Much Light
reviewDescription: Great size and easy to connect to multiple devices. Would be best used in a smaller room or a smaller space. We tried using it for an outdoor movie night and it simply didn't have enough light.
The sound is very low but was easy to set up. I purchased for outdoor use primarily and it has to be DARK to see.
I have yet learned how to work this product it is not as easy as it seems. I wish I could send it back

reviewTitle: Works as it should but some design flaws
reviewDescription: Great picture and sound quality for the price. The adhesive hooks that came with the screen are terrible quality fell down after one day of the screen being up. Also, where the jack port for inserting a tripod is positioned in an odd place on the projector. So due to the weight of the device it would tip backwards and not stay in position when placed on a tabletop tripod.

UPDATED:I've used this as my TV for a few months! While I had a struggle with getting it propped up, it's definitely a 'you pay what you get!'It was a good "First time projector". Better if you are in total darkness, but if you aren't picky, sometimes I crack the window a bit. EDIT: It's very good quality, and honestly you'd have to be very meticulous or dramatic to say that the image is poor if you're not watching a film in dim light like you should. Projectors aren't meant to be used in a well lit room.That being said, I greatly enjoyed this projector.Either way, suddenly it started to fan really loud. Upon investigation, I rotated the projector and it began to growl really loudly. I was worried the machine was offing itself and turned it off immediately. It slowly would get louder every time I turned it on, to the point I'd have to have the volume up pretty loud to be able to hear my shows. The quality of the film was the same otherwise.Nothing was jammed or in the fan at all.I have no idea how go fix it, or how it even happened. I've never dropped it, and the fan is clear as far as I can tell. I'm very disappointed because it was so good!UPDATE - The company reached out to me via email! At first, I had recalled reading an email saying that someone got a scammy email asking for personal information, and at first I was on guard. However, they sent a screenshot of my purchase that showed a screen only the seller would have access to, confirming their legitimacy. All they asked for was my address because they didn't have access to my shipping address (the system deletes it after the initial sale is made) and they sent me not just a replacement, but an upgrade. It's so nice and quiet, and I can comfortably hear my shows again!I wasn't required to return or send back the old projector, which I'm thankful for! The communication between the seller and I was smooth and it didn't raise any red flags. I'm very satisfied with this purchase!
Loved it until the sound stopped working out the blue. How can this be fixed?

If $70-$80 is your budget, by all means you can’t go wrong with this. As the higher quality ones can run up to the $600+. By saying this, do not be surprised if it doesn’t meet your expectations as far as quality and clarity.I bought this instead of a TV because I thought it’d be cool to have it cover my entire wall. And to save money as well. Well it did just that.Unfortunately, the media I was streaming from my laptop was in 1080p. But on projection, it was more like 480p.Loud fan, and it emits a hot plastic smell when running.

reviewTitle: Its okay for what I need it for
reviewDescription: It's a bit blurry on the bottom corner , it just won't focus but not a huge deal I guess. The box was also damaged a bit.

reviewTitle: Pretty good for a cheap little projector

screen wasn’t great unless you have a nice pure dark background for the screen. overall easy use and set up. ok for price

I love the size of the imagw and the quality it took us a bit to set up, and has to buy the roku stick but after that we love the kids enjoy it a lot, as a mom of an autistic child whos broken 3 tvs this was our last resort!

Great projector for the price, however it is falsely advertised to have Bluetooth. Bluetooth is a wireLESS connection, however you need an external cord to make it that or a USB cord to hook up to a speaker. The speaker on it is not very loud. You get what you pay for, besides that it’s a great projector!!!!

I think this is a great product for the price. I bought this in March 2023 and it worked fine for a year with almost daily use. The Bluetooth capability is perfect for our set up, but even the internal speakers are fine (much better than the internal speakers you will find in a similarly priced product). However, after one year, the bulb has burned out. I have contacted customer service to see if I am able to replace the bulb only. If that is not an option, I will update my review to 3 stars, as this would be wasteful to have to buy a completely new projector every year, and I will have to consider purchasing a different projector for the sake of being ecologically (and financially) responsible.
Aún no lo he probado como tal, pero hice una prueba cuando me llegó y se ve fantástico!!

reviewTitle: Could be brighter but worked fine.
reviewDescription: Took it camping along with a portable generator and it worked great once it got dark enough. Brightness could be better. Other than that, sound was fine. We ended up hooking up a Bluetooth speaker to it and worked even better for the sound

Kinda disappointed . Got this for my daughter’s birthday party and I’m glad I tested it out before. The picture is good however it only works if you had Apple TV not other apps like i thought it did, and you also have to have Disney plus for the Apple TV movies to play . The only two things I didn’t have so if you’re trying to airplay or play Netflix on it like I thought it won’t work . Sounds isn’t good which I already figured easing the reviews but it was easy to connect the speaker to it.Update with the fire stick it works perfect just like how we wanted ! We can watch all the movies now from Netflix and Hulu it’s been great for our family movie nights .

I don't personally recommend this projector for the following reasons:- The brightness is very low, maybe 100 ANSI lumens at most.- The 100” screen that’s included is extremely thin, not useful.- The projectors mount hole is poorly made, mine broke shortly after setup.- The 720p resolution is insufficient for text and details unless you're keep the projector at a short distance from the wall or screen. It's impractical to project at the recommended max distance.- The UI and feature set are extremely limited.(Update) I'm updating my review and rating because TMY support was helpful in reaching out to me and providing a replacement unit. They have a newer model projector (V58) that improves many of the issues noted earlier.- The brightness is improved.- The higher resolution allows for a larger viewing area, text is much more legible.- Provides bluetooth for connecting a bluetooth speaker.- Allows wireless casting from mobile device.If you're going to get a TMY projector I would suggest the V58 over this and other models, it's at least useable and what you would expect from a budget projector in this price range.

reviewTitle: A fun gimmick but tv blows away this cheap projector
reviewDescription: I would guess most or all cheap projectors are like this. It was easy to setup. Shows the movie just not even close to tv quality. Fans loud. Speakers are low. If you sit just next to it you can just hear the movie enough.With a additional speaker I would recommend it for a few outdoor movie nights each summer.I read reviews for hours before buying this one that had the best. So all these under $200 ones probably aren't impressive. But I used it to watch 10 or so movies and it still works year later.
Does not work with iOS system without an HDMI converter. Bluetooth will not connect. Screen is very sheer so it has to be dark in every room around.
This product does not connect with iPhones without having an additional purchased adapter. Bluetooth is in here but does not work without adapter. Wasted time and money

reviewTitle: Sound is not good at all.
reviewDescription: It is very hard to hear when streaming movies. I have tried everything. Volume is all the way up on all devices.
I can pull up Netflix but when I try to play a movie the screen goes black
I got my order but it did not come with the screen

So sadly it’ll need to be replaced. I think it’s a great product otherwise but you have to be very careful that no one drops it or knocks it over.. 😅

reviewTitle: Only for night time or pitch black use.
reviewDescription: I knew what I was purchasing.  I am not disappointed but I need to warn anyone looking to purchase a real projector to look at Epson and viewpoint projectors first.  They need at least 20,000 Lumen with a price of T least $500 for a grown up movie night.  For kids this is fine during the winter when there is no light.The image quality and the screen you get don't help each other everything is just overblown which is perfect for getting creative.  It's ok for a 3 year old.

For several weeks we used this projector with your computer as a tv, overall the picture was pretty crisp (a little fuzzy on the corners). The big issue was that after watching for ~90 minutes the picture would go black. We would have to restart the projector several times. At first I thought it was an issue with over heating but over time it would cut out sooner and sooner, plus the unit did not feel hot.
Bought this and used a handful of times.  Went to go turn it on and it started making loud noises then shut off.  It no longer works.  No power at all.
This projector prettt is just a motor with a remote. There's no way of watching anything without purchasing an adapter, there's no Bluetooth , no WiFi , no batteries. Just a projector and screen .

Update - Customer service promptly reached out to provide a resolution. Adding a star for the fast and friendly service.Only used a handful of times over the past 3 months and each time there is an issue. Either the picture won’t show or the buttons on the projector stop working. Tried to watch an outdoor movie last night and menu buttons wouldn’t work via remote or projector. I wish I had taken the money spent on this and invested in a quality product.

reviewTitle: Less than desireable. Look for better
reviewDescription: Video quality is horrible. There is no HD or option to set it to HD. I tried from my Roku HD, to my laptop, to my Xbox. If the screen is 3 feet away, the picture is crystal clear. Anything beyond 3ft and it looks bad. Might need to return this...I primarily got it for movie by the pool nights, so I was excited for the screen. It to is cheaply made.Lacks technology as well. No wifi, or Bluetooth. Just not a good buy

reviewTitle: Ok quality but not a tv replacement/not for long term use
reviewDescription: The quality of the picture isn’t bad, honestly. Basically useless during a bright day, but that’s to be expected. BUT. It shuts off after continuous use. Like more than an hour or two. It will keep playing the sound, but the picture cuts out and won’t come back. When I turn it off and let it chill for a while it works again, but for a shorter time than before. Sent it back.

reviewTitle: Stopped working after a couple of months
reviewDescription: i honestly wanted to like this product and at first i did but after a couple of months using the projector maybe twice a week it stopped working all together. It sucks because its a decent product. I have contacted customer support but have yet to hear back from them.

The sound will continue to play but no picture. The only fox we have found is to turn off the projector and turn it back on, but the video will just shut off again in about 20 minutes. Very disappointed and wanting to know if there is a way to fix??

reviewTitle: Really dark and hard to see
reviewDescription: I mean you get what you pay for here. It does the job, but forget watching something during the day. Room has to be blacked out.
Item never was able to play without addtl adapters being purchased and software download. Too complicated and unable to use for Holiday so I’m sending it back.
Cool could be better

Good for the price, but the bluetooth audio is delayed so I would say latency is a problem. Ive just been using the audio jack. The screen it comes with is ok but I recommend a solid screen as it helps with the vibrance of the projector. Good for being a portable workhorse .
This is a great projector if you don’t care about a super clear image. I think it is worth it for the price.

reviewTitle: Was not bright enough for outside use
reviewDescription: I was disappointed because I thought this would be bright enough to use outside under a covered patio. It was not through any daylight. The video image was not bright enough to make it worthwhile even to watch slow steady slideshows.I will say, though, that in a perfectly dark room, the quality of the video in the image was actually quite good

reviewTitle: Good picture, loud fan, HDMI and USB ports too close together
reviewDescription: I bought this projector but ultimately returned it because it would not accommodate both an HDMI fire stick and a USB cord to power it. The two ports are next to each other and there is not enough clearance to fit them both in place at the same time. Everything worked well on the unit, but the Keystone dial seemed to turn a little loosely as if it would be prone to move from where you set it, and it didn't feel solid. A little more resistance would have made this feel better, though the operation was still effective.I was impressed with the picture quality and brightness compared to my old mini projector which is 6 years old. The sound from the fan was noticeable but not horrible. Better than the unit it was replacing, but still not as quiet as some that are out there for a little more money that also includes extra USB and HDMI ports.

reviewTitle: You get what you pay for
reviewDescription: As someone who loves the outdoors and watching sports, i've come to love projectors. Currently I own a 3300 lumen Benq projector that works well, but isn't bright enough when there is any daylight. So when I saw this projector that advertised more than double the brightness of my current projector for only $80 I thought it was worth a try.Well, you get what you pay for...Pros:CheapSmall/portableLightweightCons:LoudSeems to be roughly half the brightness of my 3300 lumen projectorEven brand new it had dirt spots in the picture**Could not get the entire picture to focusIn the attached pictures you can see the TMY on the left and my benq on the right, the brightness difference is very noticeable. Also, I thought I was going crazy with the focus. I'd focus the center, but then the edges were blurry. Then I'd focus the edges and the center was blurry. That's what the other 2 pictures are.  Between the lack of brightness, the focus issues and the dirty spots, I'm better off sticking with what I have.I did give 2 stars, because it's cheap and it does project an image. This would probably be good if you're looking to watch cartoon movies in your backyard with kids. But nothing more than that.Edit Oct 28 2022:. Customer service reached out to me and sent a new projector. It's a little brighter, but not by much. Adding one more star because I was impressed with their customer service.

I don’t know much about projectors I just wanted to set up one in my bedroom for the occasional movie. I got this for the price point and while it definitely does the job some things to consider: it doesn’t haven’t any kind of shut off sleep timer you can set so it will continuously run and the fan starts off pretty loud and after a couple years of not that much use the fan is so loud that I almost don’t want to use it anymore. It’s also already started having some connectivity issues where the picture will flicker on and off or the screen will go black. That being said the first year I had it it definitely did the job.

Update:While I stand by my original review that the projector is not high quality and you get what you pay for, I will say the customer service is five-star. They quickly addressed the issue in a manner that was acceptable. The product is apparently not suitable for academic presentations, which I was unaware of at the time I ordered this. It is really designed for in-home theater use. I am not really sure what the difference is. A projector is a projector. It should not really matter what setting it is used for. Because Customer service addressed the issue in a very quick, professional, and appropriate manner, I have increased my original rating of one star to three stars. I do not feel I can remove the review, however, because I think it is important for people to know that this is not s suitable product for academic or commercial presentations. My hope is that by leaving this review it will prevent others from making the same mistake I made.Original Review:This is an inexpensive projector that I bought for emergency use in my classroom. Being that I had to provide the projector instead of the school, I opted for the most economical one. You get what you pay for.  Even after making the necessary adjustments, the picture quality was very poor. I suspect it was because the projector was too far away from the wall that I was projecting onto, but I was limited in where I could place the projector because of the outlet locations.
Take my advice and get a more up to date one with HD smh***Upgraded and now I am able to watch it perfectly fine and it’s Bluetooth!!

I already wear glasses so to watch something without glasses and it be super blurry. Just screams migraine.

reviewDescription: El volumen muy bajo, la imagen borrosaPara lograr ver en pantalla grande tendrás que alejarlo mucho.

reviewTitle: Great Picture Quality but Minor Issues
reviewDescription: This is definitely a get what you pay for item. I will say the quality of the picture is great along with the sound, but the fan is incredibly loud and not ideal for a bedroom. Also, the size of the picture cannot change without changing the location of the projector, meaning if I want to project a specific size without changing the location of the physical projector then tough luck. Still good quality, but there are a few too many little things that I dislike about it (quality of the remote is cheap, loud fan, screen size, and definitely puts off some heat after running for a few hours).

reviewTitle: It is a basic unit, lower your expectations
reviewDescription: There is limited range with this projector, in a small space like I have, it is hard to find a spot or distance to enlarge the picture / video.The clarity/ quality of the picture is also limited and can be blurry at times. Not very bright, the room must be almost completely dark to get a good picture.Overall, it works but don't expect high grade quality, it is a basic unit.

This is not such a great bargain because you can't play from a Chromebook with the HDMI.  I have a different brand that plays my Chromebook and smartphone just fine.  This one does not so I would say spend a little more and get a model that is more compatible without having to spend more money on additional adapters just to make it compatible.

reviewTitle: It’s ok for the price, I guess.
reviewDescription: Image quality is 720p, the image looks way better in the laptop than projected.  It is mostly blurry at more than 6-7 feet from wall. A bit too bright, even with brightness down to 0.  The fan is noticeably loud. I’ve also noticed the manual keystone corrector moves on its own a bit with time.The added screen is a cloth, image goes right through it and looks blurry. Not very useful.Would’t buy again at more than $50.

This version is better then the older version but the picture quality in their picture they say it looks like is wrong. Its not bad for being under $100. Good for kids. If your looking for a real projector then you will need to spend $300 +
